item.description:
Hey Everyone!

I apologize for setting this one up at the very last minute! Some of us were thinking of heading out to Good Times Emporium in Somerville this Saturday and it would be great if more people came along and joined in the fun!

Good Time Emporium claims to be New England's largest indoor amusement center and sports bar.

Activities:
1) Go Karting - $8.00, Passenger - $2.00
2) Laser Tag - $6.00
3) Over 200+ Video Games
4) 60 Regulation Pool Tables
5) Batting cages
6) Bumper Cars - $2.00
7) Bowling .........and more!

Other Pros: Food and drinks are available at the sports bar + Free Parking

More details on the website:
Good Times Emporium



See you there!
item.name: Last Minute Event : Good Time Emporium on 27th Oct, Saturday
